data.title: Nardin Academy gifted $1M; largest single donation
data.meta_description: Nardin Academy recently announced that it has received a $1 million gift, the largest single donation that has been made in the school’s history. The unrestricted gift will help fund Nardin’s board of trustee-approved strategic priorities, specifically capital enhancements and student scholarships. data.text:
Nardin Academy recently announced that it has received a $1 million gift, the largest single donation that has been made in the school’s history. The unrestricted gift will help fund Nardin’s board of trustee-approved strategic priorities, specifically capital enhancements and student scholarships. According to the school, the donor wishes to remain anonymous. “Nardin is blessed to have people who believe […]
